codesample.timeline

Class EmailReader

  • java.lang.Object
    • codesample.timeline.EmailReader

  • public class EmailReader
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is to create a timeline from all E-mails that exist within a specific path.
    Author:
    mcarlton

      • readEmails

        public void readEmails(java.nio.file.Path path)
                throws java.io.FileNotFoundException
        Reads all of the emails that are found within the given path and adds them to our internal timeline. Works recursively.
        Parameters:
        path - the path to check for emails
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - if the input path cannot be found
